salaryExpectations: Project-based. Can range from LKR 20,000 per day for aerial cinematography to much higher for industrial surveys.
futureOutlook: The use of drones is expanding beyond cinematography into commercial applications like agricultural surveying, construction monitoring, and industrial inspections. This creates opportunities for skilled and certified pilots. As regulations evolve and technology advances, new use cases will continue to emerge, making this an exciting, technology-driven field.
